hub.title: Em1t | Hub
hub.hero: Welcome to my development hub. I do random things here.

admin.title: Admin Login Screen
admin.description: This is a login screen for an admin panel. It's a part of my 'Stredoškolská Odborná Činnosť' project I'm working on in my free time. The design is simple and clean. The background is an abstract art of waves. The app uses SvelteKit with TailwindCSS and PocketBase for the backend.

clientArea.title: Client area
clientArea.description: This is a client area for my 'Stredoškolská Odborná Činnosť' project, where I'm creating a website for a local company. The design is simple and clean, with a light theme. The app uses SvelteKit with TailwindCSS and PocketBase for the backend.

supportSystem.title: Support system
supportSystem.description: Support system for my project that is currently on-hold. I experimented with SvelteKit components a lot, and created a versatile table system that can be used in many different ways. The app uses SvelteKit with TailwindCSS and PocketBase for the backend.

supportMessages.title: Support messages
supportMessages.description: Realtime support messages for my project that is currently on-hold. Messages support mark-up, and can even have file/image attachments. The app uses SvelteKit with TailwindCSS and PocketBase for the backend.

zubzen.title: ZubZen - regional round Zenit WebDeveloper 2023
zubzen.description: This is a website for a fictional dental clinic. It was created for the regional round of the Zenit WebDeveloper 2023 competition. The design was traced 1:1 from a reference image, and the website is fully responsive. It was coded in PHP with pure CSS in 4 hours.

texnet.title: TexNet - work experience
texnet.description: This redesign of the TexNet website was created during my work experience at TexNet s.r.o. I completely revamped the navigation and layout of the website to make it more modern. I used PHP and plain CSS for this project. I have also worked on various networking devices and configured an AI traffic camera.

m4.title: 3D model: M4A1
m4.description: This 3D model was created by me. It's a pretty simple model, but it's a good start for me. I'm planning to create more complex models in the future.

mk47.title: 3D model: MK47 Mutant
mk47.description: I created this 3D model using a reference image directly from CMMG. It's a pretty complex model, but I managed to finish it. The internals of this gun are semi-modelled aswell.

earth.title: 3D model: The Earth
earth.description: This 3D model was an experiment where I learnt texturing and UV mapping. This model was created with the help of a BlenderGuru tutorial.

robarty.title: Robarty
robarty.description: I have been tasked with creating a complete corporate identity for a made-up company. I created a logo, business card, letterhead, and a design manual.

mockup.title: Mockup
mockup.description: I have been tasked with creating a mockup for a vitamins box with the taste of melon and sweet potatoes. The design is unique, as I tried to create a new concept, and explore futuristic design mixed with simplicity.

logo.title: Logo: Previous iteration
logo.description: This is my logo that I used for a long time. The logo is a combination of the letter 'E' and the number '1'. The logo was used in the development of my projects.

logo2.title: Logo: Current iteration
logo2.description: This is my current logo. The logo is a combination of the letter 'E' and the number '1'. The logo is more modern and clean, and it's actively used in the development of my projects. I added a heart to the logo, to symbolize my passion for graphic design.

contact.title: Em1t | Contact
contact.description: I'm open for any suggestions, job offers, or just to chat

navigation.announcement: This page has been submitted for the 18th Junior Internet competition
